add_directory.doc_string: Opens an OS dialog box to prompt for a folder to the 'Where' field in the 'Find in Files' panel.

add_word.doc_string: Adds the given word to the 'added_words' setting in the user preferences.

add_where_snippet.doc_string: Adds a snippet to the 'Where' field in the 'Find in Files' panel.

args.name: snippet
args.doc_string: The string to be inserted into the 'Where' field in the 'Find in Files' panel. Supports snippet like variables.

append.doc_string: Appends the given text string to the end of the buffer.

args.name: characters
args.doc_string: The string to be appended to the end of the text buffer.

args.name: scroll_to_end
args.doc_string: Whether to scroll to the end of the buffer after appending.

args.name: disable_tab_translation
args.doc_string: Whether to disable translating tabs to spaces.

arithmetic.doc_string: Evaluates the given expression. If the expression is not provided, it launches a TextInputHandler to gather the expression from the user.

args.name: api_completions_only
args.doc_string: Whether to include completions from snippets/completions file in the AC panel.

auto_complete_prev.doc_string: Goes to the previous entry in the AC panel, when the AC panel is visible.

add_jump_record.doc_string: Allows packages/plugins to add a jump point without changing the selection.

args.name: selection
args.doc_string: The selection to be added to the jump history. Can be an integer, a list of 2 integers or a list of list of 2 integers.

auto_complete_open_link.doc_string: Opens the first link in the details pane of the AC panel, when the AC panel is visible.
